mean_cn: adj. 联邦政府的；联邦制的
mean_en: having a system of government in which the individual states of a country have control over their own affairs, but are controlled by a central government for national decisions, etc.
sentence: The center of the federal government of the United States is in this building.
sentence_trans: 美国联邦政府的中心就在这座建筑内。
word_etyma: feder=league联盟 + al…的 → federal联盟的，联邦的
